Think Differently

Innovation in Healthcare

Bits2Bedside--a new framework of thinking about modern medical research as we translate the technological power into advancement in meaningful, effective patient outcomes.

#BITS 2 BEDSIDE A decade ago, the concept of “translational research” provided a new framework for how we think, study and develop solutions to tackle today’s present-day medical issues. The phrase “Bench to Bedside” was a well-fitting use of alliteration to convey the essence of this new way to think about modern medical research.
